title: Font from the credits of the movie The Boat That Rocked?
content:
Okay, I’m stumped. I’ve tried whatthefont and identifont to no avail. Perhaps someone could tell me what this font is called?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [1966.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20091022132440/http:/typophile.com/files/1966.jpg) | 17.69 KB |
author: MrPumpernickel

comments.content:
Hello,

[Aaux](http://web.archive.org/web/20091022132440/http:/www.type.co.uk/categories/sp/Sans/id/13395#) seems to be a good candidate.

—- Tamas Ferencz —-

Indeed it is, thanks a lot!

Ooh, it even has a OSF version, I’m sold!
